source:
兄ちゃーん、そろそろラジオのお仕事が始まるから、
キンチョーしてる亜美に、ナニか一言！
translatedstr:
Brother, I'm about to start working on the radio,
Ami is nervous, but I have something to say to her!

source: 全然緊張しているように見えないぞ
translatedstr: You don't look nervous at all.

source:
何言ってんの兄ちゃん！　亜美、緊張しすぎて
控室でお菓子５袋しか食べられなかったんだよ！？
translatedstr:
What are you talking about, brother! Ami, I'm too nervous.
I only got to eat 5 bags of candy in the waiting room!

source:
かわいそうな亜美ちゃん……！
きっと痩せ過ぎで兄ちゃんが悪く言われちゃう！
translatedstr:
Poor Ami. ......
She will probably be too skinny and my brother will get a bad rap!

source:
でもでも～。ここで亜美のテンションを上げるような
一言があればダイジョーブだよ。ほらほら～♪
translatedstr:
But - here's something to raise Ami's spirits.
One word is all it takes.

source:
なんだその流れは。というか５袋なら十分食べている
と思うけどな……。で、どんな一言が欲しいんだ？
translatedstr:
What's with that trend, I mean, five bags is plenty of food.
I guess. ....... So, what word do you want?

source:
お菓子を買ってやろうとか、楽しんでこいとか、
イタズラを頑張れ！　とか？
translatedstr:
I'll buy you candy, or tell you to go have fun,
Good luck with your pranks! And?

source:
イタズラを選択肢にいれるな。
そうだなあ……
translatedstr: Don't make pranks an option.

source: いつもの亜美らしく
translatedstr: In her usual Ami way.

source: せくしーに頑張れ！
translatedstr: Good luck with the sekushiki!

source: いつもの亜美らしく、楽しんでやればいいと思うぞ
translatedstr: I think you should just be your usual Ami and have fun.

source:
いつもの亜美らしく？　ってことは～、リスナーの
みんなが楽しく明るくなっちゃうような感じ？
translatedstr:
Just like Ami always does? I mean - the listeners'
Like it makes everyone happy and cheerful?

source:
それともそれとも、お笑いカイドーまっしぐらで
ワハハって笑っちゃうような感じかなー？
translatedstr:
Or maybe it's just a comedy kaydoh.
I wonder if it's the kind of thing that makes you laugh wahaha?

source:
そうそう、そういう方向だ。
亜美のそのパワーがみんなを明るくさせるんだ
translatedstr:
Yes, yes, that's the direction I'm going.
That power of Ami's brightens everyone's day.

source:
みんなそんな亜美を楽しみにしていると思うぞ。
だからいつもの亜美で楽しんでこい！
translatedstr:
I'm sure everyone is looking forward to seeing Ami like that.
So go have fun with your usual Ami!

source:
うん！　亜美、それならチョー得意だよ！
さっすが兄ちゃん、ナイスアドバイスだね♪
translatedstr:
Yes! Ami, I'm very good at that!
That's great brother, nice advice..............................

source:
兄ちゃん、亜美のこと、見ててね！
んっふっふ～♪　頑張るぞー！
translatedstr:
Brother, keep an eye on Ami!
Mmmmmm~~ I'm going to do my best!

source: 今日はちょっとせくしーに行こう！
translatedstr: Let's go a little sekushi-y today!

source:
やっぱり亜美はせくしーが一番だよねー！
よーし、亜美せくしーでアダルティーに頑張る！
translatedstr:
After all, Ami is the best Sekushi!
Okay, I'll do my best to adulterate it with Ami Sekushi!

source:
……ん？　でもこの前おにぎりの話であんまり
ご飯だけ頑張っても～、みたいになったような……？
translatedstr:
...... hmm? But I wasn't really talking about onigiri the other day.
Even if you only work hard on your food - like you did with ......?

source:
ま、いっか☆　亜美がせくしーなのはかわりなーい！
見ててね、兄ちゃん！
translatedstr:
Well, okay* Ami is still a sekishi!
Watch me, brother!

source: （アドバイスを間違えたような気がするぞ……）
translatedstr: (I think you got the wrong advice, ......)

source: （今回の仕事は成功だ！）
translatedstr: (This job was a success!)

source: （今回の仕事は失敗だ。次こそは！）
translatedstr: （This job was a mistake...next time!)

source:
ん？　あの後ろ姿は亜美か？
おーい！
translatedstr:
Hm? Is that Ami in the back?
Hey!

source: あっ！　兄ちゃん、おっはぴょーん！
translatedstr: Oh! Oh, brother, oh-ha-pyoo!

source:
ああ、おはよう。
ルミナスでも亜美らしさは変わらないな！
translatedstr:
Oh, good morning.
I don't see the Ami-ness changing with Luminous!

source:
モチだよ。新しいトモダチが増えたみたいでワクワク
するよね！　まさにツワモノ勢ぞろいって感じだし♪
translatedstr:
It's Mochi, and I'm thrilled to have a new friend!
It's like we're all really good at what we do!

source: それは良かった、ルミナスを頼むぞ
translatedstr: That's good to know. Luminous, please.

source:
んっふっふ～、亜美にドババーンとおまかせ！
ガンバっちゃうよ～ん♪
translatedstr:
Mmmmmm....leave it to Ami to dobabaan!
I'll do my best!

source:
よし、その意気だ。
今日も元気にいこうか
translatedstr:
Okay, that's the spirit.
Let's be in good spirits today!

source:
デデーン！　プロデューサーが、あらわれた。
亜美は『こうげき』する！　レベルマ～ックス～！
translatedstr:
Dedane! The producer showed up.
Ami will 'attack'! Level ma~x~!

source:
おっと！？　おはよう、亜美。朝から元気だな。
でも、いきなり飛びついたりしたら危ないぞ？
translatedstr:
Oops! Good morning, Ami, you're looking good in the morning.
But it's not safe to jump on them out of the blue, okay?

source:
もう兄ちゃん、ノリが悪いよ～！　ここは、
『ぐわ～』か『効かぬわ！』のどっちかっしょ？
translatedstr:
I'm already in a groove, brother~!
It's either 'gwah~' or 'it doesn't work!

source:
なるほどな。それだけ元気なら……反撃で、
亜美の今朝のレッスンメニューを追加するか
translatedstr:
I see...if that's how well you're doing, ...... fight back,
Would you like to add Ami's lesson menu for this morning?

source:
うあうあ～！　しかし、亜美は『逃げ出した』！
兄ちゃん、事務所までどっちが早いか勝負だよ～☆
translatedstr:
Uhhhhh~! But Ami 'got away'!
Brother, let's see who can get to the office faster!

source:
あ、コラ！　急に走り出したら危ないだろう。
しかも言ったそばから、走り出すのはずるくないか？
translatedstr:
Oh, Kora! It would be dangerous if you start running suddenly.
And isn't it unfair to start running as soon as you've said it?

source:
この亜美に追いつこうなどショーユセンベイ♪
兄ちゃんが負けたら、レアオヤツちょうだい！
translatedstr:
Shoyusenbei, who is trying to catch up with this Ami...
If my brother loses, give me a rare treat!

source:
それを言うなら笑止千万だろ。まったく……
しょうがないな、コンビニに寄っていくぞ
translatedstr:
That's a laughable thing to say. ...... at all.
Oh well, I guess I'll just stop by the convenience store.

source:
兄ちゃん、本日もプロデュース、
マコトにタイギである！　あっぱれ～！
translatedstr:
Brother, we are producing today,
It is Makoto and Taigi!

source:
まだ帰ってなかったのか。
ああ、またルミナスのメンバーと遊んでたんだな？
translatedstr:
You hadn't left yet.
Oh, you've been playing with the Luminous members again?

source:
それもあるけど、ん～と……ありがとね、兄ちゃん！
こーんな楽しいプロジェクトに亜美を入れてくれて！
translatedstr:
That's part of it, but hmmm...and thanks for the ......, bro!
Ami for including me in such a fun project!

source: えっ？　急にどうしたんだ？
translatedstr: What? What happened all of a sudden?

source:
べっつにー。亜美が楽しいのは、兄ちゃんの
おかげだし、今日はトクベツにほめてしんぜよう！
translatedstr:
Ami enjoys my brother's
Thanks to you, I'll give you a compliment today!

source:
……ありがとう。
亜美が楽しめてるならなによりだよ
translatedstr:
Thanks .......
I'm glad you're enjoying yourself, Ami.

source:
亜美は兄ちゃんと一緒なら、なんでもできるかんね！
というわけで、これからもヨロヨロ～♪
translatedstr:
Ami can do anything with her brother!
So, keep up the good work!

source:
兄ちゃん。オハオハロー♪
今日もイケイケでいくかんね～
translatedstr:
Oh, brother.
Let's go out with a bang today!

source:
兄ちゃん、も、もしかして、事務所に行くのではっ！
亜美も一緒に行く～！
translatedstr:
Brother, maybe you are going to the office!
Ami will go with you~!

source:
兄ちゃん、お疲れちゃん～！　なんかコンビニで
アイスを買い食いして帰りたい気分だね！　ちらっ
translatedstr:
Hey, bro! I was at some kind of convenience store.
I'm in the mood to buy some ice cream and go home!

source:
兄ちゃん、オツオツ～♪　亜美は真美とふたりで、
ミワクのディナーにいってくるよ～ん！
translatedstr:
Ami is with Mami,
I'm off to Miwak for dinner!

source:
亜美、今日の収録は、
ファン参加型番組の『びっくり世界新記録』だ
translatedstr:
Ami, today's recording,
It's a fan-participation program, "Surprising New World Record.

source:
ファンのみんなと協力して、
なんかの世界新記録を出せばいいんだよね？
translatedstr:
Work with your fans,
We should set some kind of new world record, right?

source:
ああ、新記録が出せなくても、
ファンとの交流ができる、悪くない仕事だな
translatedstr:
Yeah, even if we can't set a new record,
Not a bad job, getting to interact with the fans.

source:
亜美にかかればオニャノコさいさい！
ズバっと決めて世界でびゅーを狙っちゃうよーん☆
translatedstr:
Ami has a lot to offer!
I'm going to make a quick decision and aim for the world's best!

source:
お茶の子さいさい、な。簡単に言うけど、
挑戦する競技は直前までわからないのがな……
translatedstr:
It's easy for you to say,
You don't know what competitions you're going to try until right before the event. ......

source:
兄ちゃん、心配しすぎっしょ♪
まあ、ドロ船にでも乗ったつもりで見ていたまえ！
translatedstr:
Brother, you worry too much.
Well, watch as if you were in a droll boat!

source:
さあ、亜美ちゃんがファンと一緒に挑戦するのは、
『キズナでつなげ！　早口言葉リレー！』だっ！
translatedstr:
Now, Ami will take on the challenge with her fans,
It was "Kizuna de tsunagete!

source:
ええええ！？　早口言葉リレー！？　亜美、早口は
得意だけど、間違える方がもっと得意なんだよー！
translatedstr:
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah! Ami, you're talking too fast.
I'm good at it, but I'm even better at getting it wrong!

source:
どうしよう、兄ちゃん！
練習する時間って、ちょっとぐらいあんのかな！？
translatedstr:
What should I do, brother?
I wonder if I have a little time to practice!

source:
このままじゃ亜美の恥ずかしいあーんなシーンや
こーんなシーンが、お茶の間に……っ！
translatedstr:
If we don't do this, Ami's embarrassing ah-ha scenes and
This scene was shown at ......!

source:
どんなシーンだ！　とにかく落ち着くんだ、亜美！
ひとまず、ここは……
translatedstr:
What a scene! Anyway, calm down, Ami!
For now, here is ......

source: 言葉を分けよう
translatedstr: Let's separate the words.

source: 暗記しよう
translatedstr: Let's memorize it.

source: 間違えないように
translatedstr: Make no mistake.

source: 勢いにまかせよう
translatedstr: I'll let the momentum take me.

source:
いいか亜美、言葉を続けて言おうとしないで、
単語ごとに区切って、しっかり発音するんだ！
translatedstr:
Listen Ami, don't try to keep saying the words,
Separate each word and pronounce it well!

source:
たんご・ごとに・くぎって・いえば・いいかな！？
アイアイサー！　亜美、ガンバってみる！
translatedstr:
I'll just say "word for word" and "word for word"!
I'll try to do my best, Ami!

source:
かえる・ぴょこぴょこ・みぴょこぴょこ、
あわせて・ぴょこぴょこ・むぴょこぴょこ！
translatedstr:
Frog, Piping, and Miping,
Aso, pikyoku, mukyoku, mukyoku!

source:
……よし、しっかり言えてるぞ！
そのまま最後まで頑張るんだ、亜美！
translatedstr:
...... Okay, you're saying it well!
Keep going to the end, Ami!

source:
（結果、順調に進み、世界新記録更新！　
調子に乗った亜美が、自己流の早口言葉を披露した）
translatedstr:
(As a result, it went well and set a new world record!
(Ami, who was in a good mood, performed a self-styled rapid-fire speech.)

source:
（番組を大いに盛り上げ、制作側も大満足。
評判になって、一時期早口言葉がブームになった！）
translatedstr:
(The program was a great success, and the production team was very happy with it.
(It was so well received that for a time the fast-talking word boomed!)

source:
とにかく、お題の早口言葉を暗記しておこう！
歌詞を覚えるのと同じだと思って、やってみるんだ！
translatedstr:
Anyway, let's memorize some quick words on the subject!
Think of it like trying to memorize lyrics!

source:
アンキ？　アンキってどのアンキ？　あ、暗記！？
亜美、覚えてみるよ！　そのかわりゴホービよろ！
translatedstr:
Anki? Which Anki? Oh, memorization!
Ami, I'll try to remember!

source:
かえるぴょこぴょこぴょこみぴょこ！
あせってぴょこぴょこぴょこむぴょこーっ！！
translatedstr:
Frogs and frogs and frogs and frogs and frogs!
Pip-pip-pip-pip-pip-pip-pip-pip-pip!

source:
（少し間違えていたが、審査員も笑っていたし、
番組的には、おいしい展開になったようだ！）
translatedstr:
(I made a few mistakes, but the judges laughed too,
(Sounds like a delicious turn of events from a programmatic standpoint!)

source:
（仕事終わりにちゃっかりご褒美としてパフェを
ご馳走させられたが……頑張ったし、まあいいか）
translatedstr:
(I had a parfait at the end of the workday as a reward.
(I got a treat, but I did my best at ......, and that's okay.)

source:
とにかく焦らず、間違えないことを目指そう。
ゆっくりなら亜美も言えるだろ？
translatedstr:
Anyway, let's not be in a hurry and aim to make no mistakes.
You could say that Ami, if you take your time.

source:
かえる……ぴょこ、ぴょこ……。
み～ぴょこ、ぴょこ……！
translatedstr:
Frog ......py, py .......
Mi~Pi~Pi~Pi~Pi~Pi~Pi~Pi~Pi~Pi~Pi~Pi~Pi~Pi~Pi~Pi~Pi~Pi ......

source:
（亜美は間違えずに最後まで言うことができた。
だが、結果は時間切れでチャレンジは失敗）
translatedstr:
(Ami was able to say the last word without making a mistake.
(But the result was that time ran out and the challenge failed.)

source:
（亜美本来の魅力を出すこともできず、
出演シーンは大幅に減らされてしまった……）
translatedstr:
(It also failed to produce Ami's original charm,
(Her scenes were greatly reduced. ......)

source:
今からじゃなにをやっても遅いだろう。
後は……亜美の勢いで乗り切るしかない！
translatedstr:
It will be too late to do anything about it now.
The rest will just have to ride out the momentum of ...... Ami!

source:
うあうあ！　もう亜美の番！？
かえるが鳴くから、もうかえる……なんちゃって！
translatedstr:
Uhhhhhh! It's already Ami's turn!
Frogs croak, so I'm already a frog ......!

source:
（結局本番でも亜美はまともに早口ができない
ままで、番組は大いに盛り下がってしまった……）
translatedstr:
(After all, even in the show, Ami can't speak properly and quickly.
(The program has gone downhill a lot as it is. ......)

source: （今回の仕事は成功だ！）
translatedstr: (This job was a success!)

source: （今回の仕事は失敗だ。次こそは！）
translatedstr: （This job was a mistake...next time!)

source:
兄ちゃん、今日は握手会だよね！？
ファンの人、いっぱい来てくれてるといいなー♪
translatedstr:
Brother, you're shaking hands today!
I hope you have a lot of fans here... ♪

source:
ルミナスの活動の一環だが、
今日は亜美のみの握手会だ、頑張ろうな
translatedstr:
It's part of Luminous' activities, though,
Today we're shaking hands only with Ami, good luck.

source:
ふんふん！　よーし！
亜美が、真美たちの分までガンバんないとね！
translatedstr:
Hmmm, hmmm! All right!
Ami has to do her best to make up for Mami and the others!

source:
ああ。今までのファンを大事にするだけでなく、
新しいファンも獲得できるように、頑張ろう！
translatedstr:
Yeah, not only to take care of our existing fans,
Let's do our best to gain new fans as well!

source:
アイアイサー！　亜美様にマッカセ～ナサ～イ☆
獲得ファン数、バイバイプッシュしちゃうよ～ん♪
translatedstr:
Ami-sama ni makkase~nasai☆.
I'm going to push the number of fans I've gained, bye bye!

source:
わぁ～！　兄ちゃん、見て見て！
亜美のファンがあんなに！
translatedstr:
Wow! Brother, look and see!
Ami's fans like that!

source:
兄ちゃん！　ファンのために
亜美、なにかしてあげらんないかな！？
translatedstr:
Brother! For the fans!
Ami, can't I do something for you?

source:
みんな亜美に会いに来てくれたんだし、
いーっぱい喜んでもらいたいよっ！
translatedstr:
Everyone came to see Ami,
I want to make them happy!

source:
そうだな、特に何も準備はしてなかったが
みんなに喜んでもらうためには……
translatedstr:
Yeah, I wasn't really prepared for anything in particular.
To please everyone, please visit ......

source: また会う約束をする
translatedstr: I'll make an appointment to see you again.

source: 元気な笑顔を見せる
translatedstr: Show a cheerful smile

source: 恋バナをする
translatedstr: chat about one's love

source: 天気の話をする
translatedstr: Talk about the weather.

source:
握手する時に『また会いに来てね』って、
ファンと約束するのはどうだ？
translatedstr:
When we shook hands, he said, 'Come see me again,
How about a promise to the fans?

source:
おおー、それいいね♪　ベストアンサー！
亜美も、またファンのみんなと会いたいし！
translatedstr:
Oh, that's a good one... Best answer!
Ami also wants to see all her fans again!

source:
今日は来てくれて、サンキューベリベリマッチョ！
亜美ガンバるから、次もまた会いに来てね～♪
translatedstr:
Thank you beriberi macho for coming today!
Ami will do her best, so please come see me again next time~♪

source: は、はい！　また次も必ず来ますね！
translatedstr: Ha, yes! I will definitely come back next time!

source:
（思ったとおり亜美の声掛けは大好評だった。
ファンたちの笑顔が、それを証明している）
translatedstr:
(As I had expected, Ami's call was very well received.
(The smiles on the fans' faces attest to that.)

source:
（この様子なら次の握手会も、
きっと大いに盛り上がるだろう！）
translatedstr:
(If this is the way it looks, the next handshake will be too,
(I'm sure it will be a lot of fun!)

source:
ここにいるファンは、みんな亜美に会いに来たんだ。
その気持ちに応える『最高の笑顔』を贈ってやれ！
translatedstr:
All the fans here came to see Ami.
Give them the 'best smile' to respond to that feeling!

source:
んっふっふ～♪　イチバン得意なやつだね！
亜美のミリキでみんなをイチコロにしてくるよ～ん！
translatedstr:
I'm the best at this!
I'm going to go make everyone a piece of cake with Ami's Miriki~!

source:
今日は来てくれたみんなに、サイコーな亜美の笑顔を
プレゼントだ～っ！　どうだー効果はバツグンだっ！
translatedstr:
Psst! Ami's smile for everyone who came today!
It's a gift! How's that - it works great!

source: わああああっ！　亜美ちゃん、かわいいーーー！
translatedstr: Wow! Ami, you are so cute!

source:
（亜美の笑顔は効果抜群だった！
ファンも笑顔で、良い雰囲気の握手会になったぞ）
translatedstr:
(Ami's smile was very effective!
(Fans were smiling, and there was a good vibe at the handshake.)

source:
恋バナとかどうだろう？
普段はしない話を聞けたら喜ぶかもしれないぞ
translatedstr:
How about a love story?
You might be pleased to hear something you wouldn't normally.

source:
今日は来てくれてサンキューベリマッチョ♪
ねえねえ、好きな人っているの？　亜美はさあ……
translatedstr:
Thank you for coming in today, Bellimacho... ♪
Hey, hey, is there someone you like? Ami, come on. ......

source:
（急に恋バナをふられたファンたちは照れて困惑し、
その後、会場の雰囲気が微妙になってしまった……）
translatedstr:
(Fans who were suddenly asked about their love lives were embarrassed and bewildered,
After that, the atmosphere in the hall became more subtle (......)

source:
急に言われても、こっちも準備ができていないし、
とりあえず天気のこととか話してみたらどうだ？
translatedstr:
I'm not ready to be told suddenly,
In the meantime, why don't you talk about the weather or something?

source:
今日はピッカンカイセーで良かったね！
雨の日は亜美もキブンがドンヨリなんだ～……
translatedstr:
I'm glad you had a good pickan cayce today!
Ami is also kibbutz on rainy days~ ......

source:
（天気の話題のほかに会話が続かず、特に握手会も
盛り上がることなく終わってしまった……）
translatedstr:
(I couldn't carry on a conversation besides the topic of the weather, and especially the handshake.
(......) which ended without much fanfare.

source: （今回の仕事は成功だ！）
translatedstr: (This job was a success!)

source: （今回の仕事は失敗だ。次こそは！）
translatedstr: （This job was a mistake...next time!)

source:
うわ～、遊園地だよ！　兄ちゃん！
収録で遊園地に来れるなんてラッキーですな～
translatedstr:
Wow, it's an amusement park, brother!
You're lucky to be able to come to an amusement park for a recording!

source:
あ、亜美！
仕事で来てるんだぞ、そう走り回るな！
translatedstr:
Ah, Ami!
I'm here on business, don't run around so much!

source:
わ～かってるって～。バラエティ番組の収録っしょ？
亜美がアトラクションに乗るだけでいいの～？
translatedstr:
I know what I'm talking about! It's a recording for a variety show, right?
Ami can just ride the attractions~?

source:
アトラクションにチャレンジしつつ、
亜美のリアクションを撮るのがメインかな
translatedstr:
While challenging attractions,
I guess the main thing is to capture Ami's reaction.

source:
んっふっふ～♪　亜美の得意分野だね！
激しい系のアトラクションでよろよろ～！
translatedstr:
Hmmm~♪ That's Ami's specialty, isn't it?
Stagger in the intense attractions!

source:
わかったよ。それじゃ、
その方向で番組ディレクターと打ち合わせしようか
translatedstr:
All right, then,
Let's have a meeting with the program director in that direction.

source:
亜美ちゃんのオススメや希望があるなら、
それで撮影を進めさせてもらいますよ
translatedstr:
If Ami has any recommendations or wishes,
I'll let you proceed with the shoot with that.

source:
えっ、亜美の好きなやつでいいの！？　ホントに！？
それなら……ヤッパここは絶叫系っしょ！
translatedstr:
What? Ami's favorite is fine! Really!
Then ...... is the place for screams!

source:
こうズバーッ！　ビュ～ン！　ドーン☆　ってさ！
なんたってリアクションしやすいもんね！
translatedstr:
It's like, "Zuba-boom, boom, boom*!
After all, it's easy to react!

source:
あ、普通のアトラクションでも、
亜美ならチョー面白いことができるよ、兄ちゃん！
translatedstr:
Oh, and regular attractions, too,
Ami can do some very interesting things, brother!

source:
なるほど、亜美の希望はわかったよ。
そうだな、じゃあ……
translatedstr:
I see, I know what Ami wants.
Right, then ......

source: ジェットコースター
translatedstr: roller coaster

source: コーヒーカップ
translatedstr: coffee cup

source: お化け屋敷
translatedstr: haunted house

source: ウォーターライド
translatedstr: waterride

source:
ここはジェットコースターがいいんじゃないか？
遊園地といえば定番だしな
translatedstr:
I think a roller coaster is in order here, don't you?
It's a classic when it comes to amusement parks.

source:
やったー♪　兄ちゃんは話のわかる男だ！　そんじゃ
『ジェットコースター１０連続チャレンジ』開始～！
translatedstr:
Yay! You're a man who knows what he's talking about!
Start of "Roller Coaster 10 Consecutive Challenges" ~!

source:
ヤッホー！　兄ちゃん！
んじゃ、１２周目行ってくるぴょ～ん！！
translatedstr:
Yoo-hoo, brother!
Well, I'm off to the 12th lap!

source:
いい笑顔だよ、亜美ちゃん！
その調子でどんどんいってみようか！
translatedstr:
Nice smile, Ami!
Let's keep it up!

source:
（その後、亜美のチャレンジは２０周まで続き、
リアクションも上々、撮れ高はばっちりだった）
translatedstr:
(Ami's challenge then continued for 20 laps,
The reactions were great, and the photos were well taken.)

source:
（ディレクターも満足してくれたらしく、
また番組に亜美を起用したいと言ってくれた）
translatedstr:
(The director also seemed satisfied,
(She said he'd love to have Ami on the show again.)

source:
ここは、あえて王道アトラクションを外して
コーヒーカップに挑戦してみるか？
translatedstr:
I dare you to take off the royal attractions here.
Want to try a cup of coffee?

source:
亜美の『絶叫！　コーヒーカップ超回転』だね！
んっふっふ～♪　スタッフさんは耐えられるかな～
translatedstr:
It's Ami's "Scream! Coffee Cup Super Rotation!
Mmmmmm~♪ I wonder if the staff can stand it~!

source:
まだまだ回すよ～！　それそれそれー☆
時速１００キロ突破、目指しちゃうかんね～！
translatedstr:
I'm still going to turn it!
I'm aiming to break 100 km/h!

source:
（結果、亜美より先に撮影スタッフがダウンしたが、
それが番組的な面白さに繋がり、大好評だった）
translatedstr:
(Although as a result, the film crew went down before Ami did,
(That made for an interesting programmatic experience and was very well received.)

source:
女の子のリアクションといえば……。
やはり、お化け屋敷しかないだろ
translatedstr:
Speaking of girls' reactions, please visit .......
After all, there's only the haunted house.

source:
亜美の『お化け屋敷最速攻略』スタートだよ！
さっそく『ヌケミチ』を発見！　とっつげーき☆
translatedstr:
Ami's "Fastest Haunted House Strategy" is about to begin!
I found "Nukemichi" right away!

source:
（勢い余った亜美は、一気にバックヤードを駆け抜け
……撮影班が置き去りだ。撮り直しだな……）
translatedstr:
(Ami, in a fit of energy, ran through the back yard at once.
(...... film crew left behind; we'll have to reshoot. ......)

source:
ここはウォーターライドにしよう。
水飛沫も派手だし、リアクションもしやすいだろう
translatedstr:
Let's make this a water ride.
The splashes would be flashy and easy to react to.

source:
亜美の『濡れてはイケナイ・ウォーターライド！』
スタート♪　それ！　ジャバッ……うあうあ！？
translatedstr:
Ami's "Don't Get Wet Water Ride!"
Start ♪ That's it! Jabba ...... ughhhhh!

source:
（開始早々ずぶ濡れになった亜美。しかも、
替えの衣装を用意しておらず、撮影は中止に……）
translatedstr:
(Ami was soaked to the skin right from the start,
(We did not have a replacement costume available, and the photo shoot was cancelled. ......)

source: （今回の仕事は成功だ！）
translatedstr: (This job was a success!)

source: （今回の仕事は失敗だ。次こそは！）
translatedstr: （This job was a mistake...next time!)

source:
（あそこにいるのは……亜美か？
おもちゃ屋の前で、なにをしているんだ？）
translatedstr:
(Is that Ami over there at ......?
(What are you doing in front of a toy store?)

source:
う～ん、これもおもしろそうだけど、
もっとみんなでワイワイ楽しめるのがいいかなー
translatedstr:
Hmmm, this sounds interesting too,
I wish we could have more fun together!

source:
どうした、亜美？
そんなに悩んで、なにを買うつもりなんだ？
translatedstr:
What's wrong, Ami?
What are you going to buy with so much worry?

source:
兄ちゃん、ナイスでグッドなタイミングだよ！
これだー！　ってなるグッズがなくて困ってたんだー
translatedstr:
Brother, nice and good timing!
I was having a hard time finding the right goods!

source:
グッズを探してたのか。
もしかして……
translatedstr: You've been looking for goodies.

source: パーティー用か
translatedstr: For parties.

source: イタズラ用か
translatedstr: For pranks.

source: 俺用か
translatedstr: Oh, that's for me.

source:
さっきみんなで楽しめるものがいいとか
聞こえたけど、パーティー用でも探しているのか？
translatedstr:
You said earlier that you wanted something we could all enjoy together.
I heard you. Are you looking for something for a party?

source:
うん！　亜美はルミナスのアゲアゲ担当だし！
事務所でサプライズパーティーするんだよーん☆
translatedstr:
Yes! Ami is in charge of agae-agae at Luminous!
We're having a surprise party at the office.

source: 新しいイタズラでも思いついたのか？
translatedstr: Did you come up with a new prank?

source:
おお！　ビックリドッキリ系もありかも！？　でも、
今日はみんなで楽しめるパーティー系グッズかなー
translatedstr:
Oh! There could be a surprise surprise type! But,
I wonder if today's party goods can be enjoyed by all...

source:
まったく……そんなに俺と遊びたかったのか。
気づいてやれなくてすまなかったな！
translatedstr:
Totally ...... you wanted to play with me so badly?
I'm sorry I didn't notice!

source:
うん、亜美は兄ちゃんと……って、ちっがーう！
兄ちゃんじゃなくて、ルミナスのみんなとだよー
translatedstr:
Yeah, Ami is a brother and ...... is a different story!
Not with my brother, but with everyone in Luminous!

source:
ルミナスのみんなと遊ぶグッズを探しているって……
ああ、親睦を深めるために一緒に遊ぼうとしてるのか
translatedstr:
She's looking for goodies to play with everyone in Luminous: ......
Oh, you're trying to play along for the sake of fellowship.

source:
んっふっふ～♪　仲良くなるには、
一緒に楽しく遊ぶのがイチバンだかんね～♪
translatedstr:
Mmmmmmm~♪ To get along,
The best way to have fun is to play together.

source:
亜美らしい方法だな。
じゃあ、みんなが喜びそうなものを買っていくか！
translatedstr:
That's Ami's way.
So, let's buy something that everyone will enjoy!

source:
さっすが兄ちゃん！　それじゃ、グッズ選びは亜美に
お任せだよ！　絶対に喜ぶものを用意するかんね♪
translatedstr:
Well then, let Ami pick out the goodies!
I'll leave it to you! I'll get you something you'll definitely enjoy.

source:
（亜美なりにルミナスのことを考えているんだな。
うん、いい傾向だ）
translatedstr:
(You are thinking about Luminous in your own way Ami.
(Yeah, that's a good trend.)

source:
（亜美が宿題をすると言って、事務所に宿題を
広げたが……さっきからなにも進んでなさそうだな）
translatedstr:
(Ami said she was going to do her homework, so she took her homework to the office.
(I've expanded ......, but it doesn't look like anything has progressed since I last saw you.)

source:
亜美、数学の宿題をやるんじゃなかったのか？
『今日は宿題をやる』と決めたのは、亜美だろ？
translatedstr:
Ami, I thought you were supposed to be doing your math homework.
Ami is the one who decided, "I'm going to do my homework today," right?

source:
今ちょっとやる気ゲージ回復中～☆
でも兄ちゃん。宿題って何でやらなきゃダメなの？
translatedstr:
I'm recovering my motivation gauge a bit right now.
But brother, why do we have to do homework?

source:
何で宿題をやらなきゃダメかって……。
う～ん、そうだな……
translatedstr: Why do I have to do my homework? .......

source: 将来のため
translatedstr: For the future

source: 自分のため
translatedstr: for one's own sake

source: 成績のため
translatedstr: For grades

source:
将来のためだな。今やっておけば、
亜美が大人になった時に、必ず役に立つぞ
translatedstr:
It's for the future...if you do it now,
It will definitely come in handy when Ami grows up.

source:
なるへそ～。兄ちゃんが言うと、説得力あるよね♪
つまり未来の亜美へのセンセーコーゲキってこと！？
translatedstr:
I'm sure my brother will be very persuasive when he says it.
In other words, it's a sensei-cogeki to future Ami!

source:
センセイ……って、もしかして先行投資のことか？
それなら、あってるよ
translatedstr:
Sensei, could ...... be an upfront investment?
Then you're right.

source:
自分のためかな。宿題で授業を復習すれば、
より内容が身につくだろ？
translatedstr:
Maybe for yourself, if you review the lessons in your homework,
You'll learn more content, right?

source:
そっか。亜美もダンスや歌のトレーニングは
覚えられるまでガンバって反復練習してるもんねー
translatedstr:
I see...Ami also trains for dancing and singing...
You're practicing over and over again until you can remember!

source:
やっぱり成績のためじゃないか？
苦手科目の成績が上がれば、亜美も嬉しいだろう？
translatedstr:
After all, it's all about grades, isn't it?
Ami would be happy to see her grades improve in her weak subjects, right?

source:
え～？　亜美は今のままでも、ジューブンかな？
その分レッスンしたり、イタズラしたりしたいし
translatedstr:
Eh~? Ami is still juvenile as it is?
And I'd love to give you lessons and prank you for that.

source:
宿題もレッスンと同じだな。内容よりも
亜美がその課題に、どう取り組むかが重要なんだよ
translatedstr:
Homework is like a lesson... more than the content.
It's all about how Ami tackles that challenge.

source:
でも今の亜美は、やる気ゲージが０なんだよね～。
あっ、兄ちゃんが手伝ってくれたら回復するかも！
translatedstr:
But now Ami has a zero motivation gauge!
Oh, if my brother helps me, I might recover!

source:
そうだな……、宿題が終わったら、さっき買ってきた
コンビニの期間限定プリンをあげてもいいぞ
translatedstr:
Well, ......, when you're done with your homework, I just bought it for you.
I can give you a limited time pudding from a convenience store.

source:
プリン！？　勇者アミのやる気ゲージが回復した！
宿題なんて、ババーンっとやっつけちゃうよーん☆
translatedstr:
Pudding! The motivation gauge of Ami the Brave was restored!
I'll get my homework done in a flash!

source:
ササッ！　サササッ！　スチャ！　ジー……。
……ふむふむ、買い食いはしない派っぽいのかな
translatedstr: ...... Hmmm... I guess I'm like a non-buy-and-eat kind of guy.

source:
なにやってるんだ亜美？
街中でコソコソとして……周りの人が見てるぞ
translatedstr:
What are you doing, Ami?
You're sneaking around town ...... and people are watching you.

source:
しっ！　静かにしてくれたまえ、ワトソンくん。
亜美は今、ウサミン星人をチョーサ中なのだよ
translatedstr:
Shh! Be quiet, Mr. Watson.
Ami is now chosaing the Usamin aliens!

source:
ウサミン星人……菜々を追っているのか？
しかし、調査って……
translatedstr:
Are you chasing Usamin alien ...... Nana?
But research means ......

source: ウサミン星人の好物
translatedstr: Favorite food of the Usamin aliens

source: ウサミン星の場所
translatedstr: Location of the planet Usamin

source: ウサミン星人の弱点
translatedstr: Weaknesses of the Usamin aliens

source:
菜々の好きなものでも知りたいのか？
食べ物ならおつまみ系が好きらしいって聞いたぞ
translatedstr:
You want to know what Nana likes?
I heard you like snacks as far as food is concerned.

source:
え！　兄ちゃん、ウサミン星人にくわしいの！？
よーし、ワトソンくん、君も調査係にニンメーする！
translatedstr:
You know a lot about the Usamin aliens?
Okay, Watson, I'll nimme you as an investigator, too!

source:
……まさか、ウサミン星を探すつもりか！？
ダメだ！　そこに踏み入るのは危険だ！
translatedstr:
...... Don't tell me you're going to look for the planet Usamin!
No! It's not safe to step in there!

source:
うあうあ！　国家的インボーのニオイ！？　って、
亜美はウサミン星人のことが知りたいだけだし！
translatedstr:
Ughhhhhh, the smell of a national imbroglio!
Ami just wants to know about the Usamin aliens!

source:
もしかしてイタズラでもするつもりか？
ちなみにウサミン星人の弱点なら『徹夜』だぞ
translatedstr:
Are you planning to pull a prank on us, perhaps?
By the way, if there's a weakness of the Usamin aliens, it's "all night long.

source:
兄ちゃん、それはみんな知ってるっしょ。
亜美が知りたいのは、ウサミン星人の好きなもの！
translatedstr:
Brother, we all know that, don't we?
What Ami wants to know is what Usamin alien likes!

source:
というか……本人に直接聞けばいいんじゃないか？
おんなじメンバーなんだし、教えてくれると思うぞ
translatedstr:
I mean, why don't you just ask ...... himself directly?
I'm sure they'll tell you, since you're a member of the same group.

source:
もう～兄ちゃんはオトメゴコロがわかってないな～。
ジリジリ～って近づいて、ワッってなりたいじゃん！
translatedstr:
Oh, brother, you don't understand the otome gokoro!
You want to get closer and closer, and then you want to be wowed, don't you?

source:
よく分からないが……亜美。お菓子を買って事務所に
帰るか？　ウサミン星人は、甘いものも好きなはずだ
translatedstr:
I'm not sure, but ...... Ami. bought some snacks and went to the office.
Shall we go home? I'm sure the Usamin aliens have a sweet tooth too.

source:
それで菜々が帰ってきたら、
一緒に食べようって誘ってみたらどうだ？
translatedstr:
So when Nana comes back,
Why don't you ask him to eat with you?

source:
ナイスなアイディアだよ、兄ちゃん！
やったー♪　じゃあ、お菓子は亜美に選ばせてね！
translatedstr:
Nice idea, brother!
Yay♪ Then let Ami choose the sweets!

source:
さてと、次のミニライブは、
こんな感じの流れでいくけどいいかな？
translatedstr:
Well, now for the next mini-live,
I'm going to go with a flow like this, if that's okay?

source:
うーん、あのさ、兄ちゃん！　これって亜美が
メインなんだよね？　それならさぁ……
translatedstr:
Ummm, you know what, bro! This is Ami's.
It's the main one, right? Then come on, ......

source:
おっ、亜美からもなにか意見があるのか？
実現できるかは別として、まずは言ってみてくれ
translatedstr:
Whoa, Ami has something to say about that?
Whether it can be done or not, just say it first.

source:
じゃあ、もっとドッバーンでバッキューン☆　って
みんながびっくらポンな、ど派手な演出にしたい！
translatedstr:
Then, more bang for your buck!
I want to make it a flashy production that will make everyone jump up and down!

source:
な、なるほど。
ど派手な演出、か……
translatedstr:
Oh, I see.
Flashy production, or ......

source: スモークが出るとか
translatedstr: I hear it smokes.

source: スネークが出るとか
translatedstr: I hear there's going to be a Snake.

source: 俺が出るとか！
translatedstr: I'll get it, I hear!

source:
それなら、盛り上がるタイミングにあわせて、
派手にスモークを噴射させようか
translatedstr:
Then, match it to the timing of the excitement,
Let's give it a loud blast of smoke.

source:
それいいね！　カラフルにレインボーカラーがいい！
あとあと、紙吹雪もブワーって降らせようよ！
translatedstr:
I like that! I like the colorful rainbow colors!
And later, let's make confetti fall with a whimper, too!

source:
観客がアッと驚くような……。
……ヘビと一緒にパフォーマンスとかどうだ？
translatedstr:
The audience will be aghast at .......
How about a performance with ...... snakes?

source:
アナコンダ乱入！　叫び声だって飲み込んじゃう！
……って、ルミナスのみんながビックリだよ！？
translatedstr:
Anacondas are on the loose! Even screams are swallowed!
...... is a big surprise to everyone in Luminous!

source:
それなら、俺もステージに上がって、
ひそかに特訓を積んでおいたアレをだな……
translatedstr:
Then I'll be on stage, too,
I've been secretly training for that thing. ......

source:
えええ……兄ちゃんが出てどうすんの？
ビックリはするかもだけど、派手さが足りないよ～！
translatedstr:
Yeah yeah yeah ...... what are you going to do with your brother out?
You might be surprised, but it's not flashy enough!

source:
亜美、みんなをアッと言わせるような、すっごい
ライブがやりたいの！　兄ちゃん、モチ協力してね！
translatedstr:
Ami, you are so amazing, you make everyone go awww!
I want to do a live concert!

source:
やる気だな。よし！　それなら、一緒に企画書を、
頭から見直して、アイディアを追加するか！
translatedstr:
You're up for it...OK! Then we'll write a proposal together,
Do you want to review it from the top of your head and add ideas?

source:
さっすが兄ちゃん！　頼りになる～☆
まずは～……レーザー光線はかかせないっしょ！？
translatedstr:
You're my big brother! I can count on you!
First of all ~...... laser light is a must!

source:
兄ちゃん！　このゲーセンだよ！
新しいのからレトルトゲームまで揃ってるんだ！
translatedstr:
Brother! It's this arcade!
We have everything from new to retort games!

source:
それを言うならレトロゲームだ。しかし、
ゲームセンターか。亜美はゲームが好きなんだな
translatedstr:
That's a retro game if you ask me,
Game arcade...Ami must really like games.

source:
クックックッ、このゲームの王様と呼ばれた亜美が、
兄ちゃんと勝負をしてやろうではないかー！
translatedstr:
Kukk, Ami was called the king of this game,
Let's play a game with my brother!

source: ささ、対戦するゲームを選ぶがよい！
translatedstr: Now, choose the game you want to play!

source:
亜美と対戦するゲームか。
それじゃあ……
translatedstr: A game against Ami?

source: リズムゲーム
translatedstr: rhythm game

source: 格闘ゲーム
translatedstr: beat'-em-up game

source: クイズゲーム
translatedstr: quiz game

source:
ここはあえて……リズムゲームだ！
『ダンスの達人』でゲームの王様と対戦だな
translatedstr:
I dare you to ...... rhythm game here!
You're playing against the king of the game in "Master of the Dance."

source:
兄ちゃんと亜美でダンス対決！？　んっふっふ～♪
アイドル亜美の本気を見せてあげるよ！
translatedstr:
A dance competition between my brother and Ami! Nmmmmmmm~♪
Let me show you the true spirit of the idol Ami!

source:
うーん……この『鉄腕１５』とかどうだ？
格闘ゲームかな？
translatedstr:
Hmmm ...... how about this "Ironman 15" or something like that?
Is it a fighting game?

source:
いいよ！　兄ちゃんなら、ビギナーズナッツも
あるかもしれないけど、亜美が勝っちゃうよーん☆
translatedstr:
Okay, brother, you can have beginner's nuts.
There may be, but Ami will win.

source:
この『クイズ・スマイルエンジェル』で勝負しよう。
これなら亜美の学力チェックもできるぞ！
translatedstr:
Let's play this "Quiz Smile Angel".
This would be a great way to check Ami's academic performance!

source:
ええっ！　亜美が不利っしょ！？　他のにしよーよ！
兄ちゃん、大人げない！　鬼！　アクマ！！
translatedstr:
Ami is at a disadvantage! Let's try something else!
Brother, you're not mature enough! Demon! Akuma!

source:
悪魔って……そんな言葉、大声で言うんじゃない！
今選び直すから……
translatedstr:
The devil is ...... such a word, don't say it out loud!
I'll choose again now. ......

source:
まあ、せっかくの息抜きなんだし、
勝敗にこだわらないで楽しもうか
translatedstr:
Well, it's a nice break,
Let's have fun and not worry about winning or losing.

source:
そうだね！　でも勝負に勝って、ホーシューをゲット
したいから～……次のゲームは、亜美に選ばせてね！
translatedstr:
Yes, but win the game and get the ho-ho-shoes!
I want to ~...... so let Ami choose the next game!

source:
今日の営業は移動が多くて大変だったな。
亜美は疲れてないか？
translatedstr:
Today's business was a lot of moving around.
Ami, are you tired?

source:
兄ちゃん、亜美の元気はカラッポ……。
もうスッカリスッカラカンガルーだよー
translatedstr:
Brother, Ami's energy is empty. ......
I'm already a skunky kangaroo!

source:
お疲れか。時間もないし、歩きながら食べられそうな
ものを、そこのコンビニで買ってくるよ
translatedstr:
You're tired...no time to walk around and eat.
I'll get you something at the convenience store there.

source: （さて、なにか亜美が喜びそうなものは……）
translatedstr: (Well, something Ami might enjoy: ......)

source: あんまん
translatedstr: bun with anko filling

source: 食玩
translatedstr: premium

source: ポテトチップス
translatedstr: potato chips

source: 亜美、あんまんを買ってきたぞ
translatedstr: Ami, I got you a bean-jam bun.

source:
やったー！　兄ちゃん、ありがとう！
あまいもの食べると元気が出るよね☆
translatedstr:
Yay! Thank you, brother!
Eating sweet food cheers you up, doesn't it?

source: （よし！　すごく喜んでくれているな……！）
translatedstr: (Okay! You're making me very happy. ......!)

source: ほら、亜美の好きな食玩だぞ
translatedstr: Here, Ami's favorite toy.

source:
サンキュー兄ちゃん！
これ、コンプ目指して集めてたんだよねー
translatedstr:
Thank you brother!
I've been collecting these for comps!

source: （ふう、どうやら喜んでくれたみたいだ）
translatedstr: (Phew, apparently he's pleased.)

source: 亜美がよく食べてるポテトチップスだぞ
translatedstr: Ami eats a lot of potato chips.

source:
兄ちゃん、ポテトチップスは好きだけど、
食べ歩きには向いてないよ～
translatedstr:
Brother, I like potato chips,
It's not a good place to eat!

source: （うーん、あまり喜んでくれなかったみたいだ……）
translatedstr: (Hmmm, I don't think he was too happy about it. ......)

source:
（俺のところに亜美がやってきた。事務所内で
メンバー同士のモノマネが、流行しているらしい）
translatedstr:
(Ami came to me, in my office.
(Apparently, mimicry among members of the group is all the rage.)

source:
んっふっふ～♪　兄ちゃんにはこの動きが
誰のモノマネか、見破れますかなぁ？　せーの！
translatedstr: I wonder if I can find out whose impersonation it is? Let's see!

source: なるほど。その動きは……
translatedstr: I see...that move: ......

source: 美嘉
translatedstr: Mika

source: 咲耶
translatedstr: Sakuya

source: 紬
translatedstr: Tsumugi

source: 美嘉だな？
translatedstr: Mika, right?

source:
んっふっふ～♪　せいか～い☆　これで亜美も、
せくしー路線のクリスマスなギャルっしょ！？
translatedstr:
Ami is now also,
Christmasy gal on the Sekushi line!

source:
クリスマスじゃなくて、カリスマな。
でも、なかなか特徴を捉えていて、いい感じだったぞ
translatedstr:
Charisma, not Christmas.
But you did a pretty good job of capturing the features.

source: もしかして……咲耶か？
translatedstr: Could it be ...... Sakuya?

source:
はぁ～……このせくしーが分からないなんて、
兄ちゃんの見る目も、まだまだなようですな～？
translatedstr:
Hah~ ...... I can't believe you don't understand this sekushin,
It seems that my brother's eyes are not quite up to snuff yet~?

source:
（間違えたみたいだ……。
誰のモノマネだったんだろう）
translatedstr:
(I think I made a mistake. .......
(I wonder whose impersonation that was.)

source: もしかして紬か？
translatedstr: Perhaps pongee?

source:
あれ？　このせくしーが伝わらないなんて
亜美、どっか間違えちゃったかな～？
translatedstr:
Huh? I can't believe you didn't get this sekkushii.
Ami, did I make a mistake somewhere?

source: （間違えたか。一体誰のモノマネだったんだろう）
translatedstr: (I must have got it wrong...who the hell was I impersonating?)

source:
兄ちゃん兄ちゃん！　亜美の新作声マネだよーん♪
誰のマネなのか兄ちゃんに見破れますかなぁ？
translatedstr:
Ami's new voice mimicry!
I wonder if my brother will be able to find out whose impersonation it is?

source:
声マネ？　ボイストレーニングの一種か。
面白そうじゃないか、聞かせてくれ
translatedstr:
Voice mannequin? Is it a type of voice training?
Sounds interesting, let me hear it.

source:
『みんなの声援受けとめて、
魔法少女にメルヘンチェーンジ♪　キャハッ☆』
translatedstr:
I'm sure everyone will cheer for you,
Magical Girl with a Mercurial Chain Ji♪ Cahhhh☆"

source: う～ん、その声は……
translatedstr: Hmmm, that voice is ......

source: 菜々
translatedstr: Nana

source: 果穂
translatedstr: Kaho

source: 翼
translatedstr: Tsubasa

source:
間違いなく菜々のモノマネだな。
うん、なかなか上手だぞ
translatedstr:
Definitely a Nana moniker.
Yeah, you're pretty good.

source:
んっふっふ～♪　これで亜美もウサミン星で
大ブレイクまちがいナッシングだぴょーん☆
translatedstr:
Now Ami can be on the planet Usamin too!
I'm sure it's going to be a big break for you.

source: （当たってよかった。亜美も喜んでいるぞ）
translatedstr: （I'm glad you got it right, Ami would have loved it.)

source: もしかして果穂のモノマネか？
translatedstr: Perhaps an imitation of Kaho?

source:
兄ちゃん、分かってないねー。
果穂ちんが変身するのはヒーローだよ？
translatedstr:
Brother, you don't understand.
Kaho is the hero who transforms into a hero, right?

source: （間違えたか。次は当てよう……）
translatedstr: (You guessed wrong. Guess next time. ......)

source: うーん……翼のモノマネか？
translatedstr: Hmmm ...... wing moniker?

source:
う～ん……亜美の特訓不足？
それとも兄ちゃんの耳がダメダメなだけ？
translatedstr:
Hmmm... ...... Ami's lack of training?
Or is it just that my brother's ears are not good enough?

source:
（う、辛辣な評価だな……。
次は間違えないようにしよう）
translatedstr:
(Ugh, that's a harsh assessment. .......
(Let's not make a mistake next time.)

source:
（亜美の仕事終わり、
気分転換を兼ねて出かけることにした……）
translatedstr:
(Ami's end of work,
I decided to go out for a change (......)

source:
（もうこんな時間か……。
亜美も楽しんでくれたようだな）
translatedstr:
(Is it that time already? .......
(Ami seems to have enjoyed it too.)

source:
兄ちゃん！　今日はと～っても楽しかったね。
次はもっと亜美をたのしませるがよい！
translatedstr:
I had a lot of fun today, didn't I?
Let Ami have more fun next time!

source:
んっふっふ～。　兄ちゃんは亜美を喜ばせた！
兄ちゃん経験値を１手に入れたー！
translatedstr:
Mmmmmm.... Big brother made Ami happy!
I got 1 experience, brother!
